name: HenTris
description:
HenTris = Hentai + Tetris !!!
Enjoy great strategies with great moments of brain activity, try to destroy the censorship to get to see the most beautiful girls you've ever seen !!!

FEATURES

  • You will be excited and rest easy.
  • Surrounding musics.
  • Increasing difficulty.
  • A new formula for an old acquaintance.
  • 15 levels for you to try to win censorship.
  • Random events.
  • Where the classic meets the modern.
  • Guaranteed fun.
  • Great satisfaction when you break a part of the censorship.
